item.title: Úvod - web věnovaný jižnímu buddhismu
item.description: My Path to coding Links to some of the projects/websites that I have created. Live projects How to Create Pandita - created with Jekyll Pandita.cz - created with Hugo Contact Manager - created with React GitHub Repos How to Create Pandita - Jekyll Pandita.cz - Hugo Contact Manager (REACT) The beginning My coding journey started in 2015 when I wanted to create a website (dharmazdarma.cz) for my Buddhist publishing project Dharma Zdarma.
